channel.title: 508 Client and Server
channel.description:
Hello MoparScapeian's
I have an issue with a Client and Server, the Server loads, so I open a Client, the client loads and I run it and it's a log-in screen 'Welcome to BlahBlahBlah' I click it and it disconnect's, and I get back on and I click a stuff and It'll disconnect me again -> again -> again.
I have tried different clients and sources. THEY ALL do this.
Please help me ASAP.
Many thanks from your friend, Disengage.

item.title: 508 Client and Server
item.dc:creator: @Disengage Disengage
item.description:
@Disengage wrote:

Hello MoparScapeian’s

I have an issue with a Client and Server, the Server loads, so I open a Client, the client loads and I run it and it’s a log-in screen ‘Welcome to BlahBlahBlah’ I click it and it disconnect’s, and I get back on and I click a stuff and It’ll disconnect me again -> again -> again.

I have tried different clients and sources. THEY ALL do this.

Please help me ASAP.

Many thanks from your friend, Disengage.
